before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"571fh","text":"Passivate Vivacon filter unit (Satorius Vivicon 500, 30,000 MWCO) and collection tube overnight in 5% (v/v) Tween-20 in MilliQ water. The next day, rinse with nanopure water until no suds, then rinse 3x with LC-MS water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"chudi","text":"Spin-filter based protein digestion and purification for bottom-up proteomics","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"bkoh7","text":"It is important that nearly all liquid passes through spin filters after each centrifugation step. If a substantial amount of liquid (more than 75 μL) remains on filter after 10 minutes of centrifugation, spin for longer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fq27i","text":"Prepare fresh buffers in LC-MS water: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6a66k","text":"Exchange buffer: 8M urea, 0.2% (w/v) deoxycholate, 1M ammonium bicarbonate (pH 8)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bfqhc","text":"Digestion buffer: 0.2% (w/v) deoxycholate, 50 mM ammonium bicarbonate (pH 8)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3da0c","text":"Trypsin dissolution/peptide recovery buffer: 50 mM ammonium bicarbonate (pH 8)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72jmo","text":"Dispense 25-50μL (depending on concentration) reduced, alkylated protein extract to filter unit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eurb","text":"Wash filter unit with 200 μL digestion buffer, and spin at 14,000g for 10 min. Do this a total of 2 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7rb99","text":"Fill filter units with 200 μL exchange buffer, mix with pipet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dt204","text":"Add 110 μL digestion buffer and desired amount of trypsin (~1:50 trypsin/protein), dissolved in 50 mM ammonium bicarbonate, keeping trypsin on ice or at 4° C. Incubate at 37° C overnight. Parafilming tubes is recommended to prevent evaporation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aeivp","text":"Remove parafilm if applicable and centrifuge tubes at 14,000g for 10 min. Do not discard filtrate!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":74,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gpkl","text":"Add 50 μL of peptide recovery buffer to filters, spin at 14,000g for 10 min. Do this step a total of 2 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k98d","text":"Add 900μL ethyl acetate and 2.5 μL TFA to filtrate, vortex. Precipitate may be visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31hdo","text":"Sonicate in a bath sonicator for 10s, and centrifuge at 16,000g for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i91b","text":"Carefully remove upper organic layer with a pipet without disturbing phase boundary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2gh4","text":"Repeat steps 12, 13 and 14 two more times (Note: Only add 900μL ethyl acetate, no more TFA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eh497","text":"Place sample uncovered in Thermomixer and dry at 60° C for 5-10 minutes until ethyl acetate is gone.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c1qu7","text":"Freeze sample solid at -80° C, Centrivap to dryness.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

title: General proteomics FASP (Filter-Aided Sample Preparation)
